title: [Commercial presentation: Victorian Tourist Bureau]
brief_description: Four one minute commercials sponsored by the Victorian Tourist Bureau: The Melbourne Cup for New South Wales; Snow Fields #1 for New South Wales; Moomba for South Australia; Snow Fields #2 for New South Wales.
